errorCodeList.solution: Provide a valid quote.

errorCodeList.solution: Check /api/v1/system/currency-pairs to see whether the selected currency is enabled, and try again.

errorCodeList.solution: Request a new buy quote.

errorCodeList.message: User email address is already verified.
errorCodeList.solution: Do not perform email verification for a user whose email address is already verified.

errorCodeList.message: An error occurred while saving the transaction info.
errorCodeList.solution: Please contact support for assistance.

errorCodeList.message: Transaction info already present for this order.
errorCodeList.solution: In order to update the transaction info, send a PATCH request.

errorCodeList.solution: Leave the destination tag empty.

errorCodeList.message: User identifier does not belong to the user in the user authorization token.
errorCodeList.solution: Provide a valid user identifier, or remove the user identifier header.

errorCodeList.message: No user identifier found in headers.
errorCodeList.solution: Provide a valid user identifier, or use the user/password authentication mechanism to request a user token and send that.

errorCodeList.message: User identifier is not linked to a user.
errorCodeList.solution: Provide a valid user identifier, link this user identifier to a user account, or use the user/password authentication mechanism.
Provide a valid user identifier, a unique identifier string for the user account that is not already in use.
Please provide an identifier, consisting of 36 - 255 characters, numeric or alphanumeric only.

errorCodeList.message: There is a pending document for this side.
errorCodeList.solution: Wait for the pending document to be reviewed.

errorCodeList.solution: Upload a file with an allowed mime type.

errorCodeList.solution: Upload a file which is not empty.

errorCodeList.solution: Upload an image of a valid height.

errorCodeList.solution: Upload an image which has a valid amount of pixels.

errorCodeList.solution: Upload an image which has a valid amount of pixels.

errorCodeList.message: The image ratio is too high.
errorCodeList.solution: Upload an image which has a valid ratio.

errorCodeList.solution: Upload an image which has a valid ratio.

errorCodeList.message: The image cannot be landscape oriented.
errorCodeList.solution: Upload an image which is portrait oriented.

errorCodeList.solution: Upload an image which is landscape oriented.

errorCodeList.message: Cannot write temporary file to disk.
errorCodeList.solution: Try again. Contact our support team if the problem persists.

errorCodeList.message: No route found for this request.
errorCodeList.solution: Make sure you use an existing endpoint. Take a look at the documentation for an overview of all existing endpoints.
